name: Rusty Axe
description: Bloody axe found near the bodies.

name: Prayer Book
description: Tattered religious text found in the barracks.

name: Hardtack
description: Stale military rations found in a locker.

name: Torn Note
description: A fragment of a scientist's journal.

name: Rusty Crowbar
description: A heavy iron bar found near machinery.

name: Faded Photograph
description: A torn blackandwhite photo of a family.

name: Rusty Shovel
description: A heavy digging tool found near some disturbed earth.

name: Frozen Journal
description: A scientist's frozen diary pages with cryptic notes.

name: Ice Pick
description: A sharp tool for breaking through ice formations.

name: Warming Stone
description: A glowing stone that protects against cold.

name: Ragnarok Crystal
description: A pulsating crystal containing ancient power to rewrite reality.
